title: S2 Ep13: Distortion by audit
itunes:title: Distortion by audit
description: Auditing ensures public procurement is good value. Or does it? An experiment in Chile suggests the audit itself makes procurement less efficient afterwards. Dina Pomeranz opened the black box of the audit process and tells Tim Phillips what she discovered.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
